fields.name: robots
fields.label: Robots Configuration
fields.description: Google Search Engine Robots Meta Tag value. See https://developers.google.com/search/docs/crawling-indexing/robots-meta-tag#directives

fields.name: menu
fields.label: Menu
fields.description: When a value is provided, a link to this article will appear in the named menus.

fields.name: groupByYear
fields.label: Group By Year
fields.description: Whether or not articles are grouped by year on list pages.

fields.name: series
fields.label: Series
fields.description: Array of series the article belongs to, we recommend using only one series per article.

fields.name: series_order
fields.label: Series Order
fields.description: Position of the article within the series.

fields.name: draft
fields.label: Draft
fields.description: Whether or not this article is considered a rough draft by Hugo.

fields.name: _value
fields.label: Icon Type
fields.description: See: https://blowfish.page/samples/icons/

fields.name: _target
fields.label: Browser Context Target
fields.description: See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/a#attr-target

fields.name: images
fields.label: Images Regex
fields.description: See https://blowfish.page/docs/shortcodes/#carousel

fields.name: aspectRatio
fields.label: Aspect Ratio
fields.description: See https://blowfish.page/docs/shortcodes/#carousel

fields.name: repo
fields.label: Repository
fields.description: In `username/repo-name` format

fields.name: _value
fields.label: Icon Type
fields.description: See: https://blowfish.page/samples/icons/

fields.name: tag
fields.label: Tag
fields.description: `html` tag that will be used to render the strings

fields.name: classList
fields.label: CSS Classes
fields.description: List of `css` classes to apply to the `html` element

fields.name: initialString
fields.label: Initial String
fields.description: Initial string that will appear written and will be replaced

fields.name: speed
fields.label: Speed
fields.description: Typing speed, measured in milliseconds between each step

fields.name: startDelay
fields.label: Start Delay
fields.description: The amount of time before the plugin begins typing after being initialized

fields.name: lifeLike
fields.label: Life Like
fields.description: Makes the typing pace irregular, as if a real person is doing it

fields.name: breakLines
fields.label: Break Lines
fields.description: Whether multiple strings are printed on top of each other (true), or if they're deleted and replaced by each other (false)

fields.name: waitUntilVisible
fields.label: Wait Until Visible
fields.description: Determines if the instance will begin when loaded or only when the target element becomes visible in the viewport. The default is `true`

fields.name: loop
fields.label: Loop
fields.description: Whether your strings will continuously loop after completing

fields.name: showAuthor
fields.label: Display Author
fields.description: Whether or not the author box for the deafult author is displayed in the article footer.

fields.name: showHero
fields.label: Display Thumbnail
fields.description: Whether the thumbnail image will be shown within the article page.
